document: Newcastle have made initial moves to sign Marseille forward Andre Ayew. The 25-year-old Ghana international is out of contract in the summer and his representatives have an outline offer from Newcastle. However, there is also interest from Roma while Tottenham and Everton have asked to be kept informed. Andre Ayew is out of contract at Marseille this summer, and Newcastle have made an initial approach . Ayew has netted six times for Marseille this season, as well as scoring three during the Africa Cup of Nations . Ayew scored three goals for Ghana in the Africa Cup of Nations and has managed six all season for Marseille. Newcastle have also expressed interest in FC Sion striker Moussa Konate. The Ghana forward is wanted by several of Europe's top sides including Tottenham, Everton and Roma .
claim: newcastle have made initial moves to sign marseille striker andre ayew. ghana international is out of contract in the summer. roma and everton have asked to be kept informed. ayew has netted six times for marseille this season.
